question: Which is the largest residential university in Asia?
explanation: Banaras Hindu University is the largest residential university in Asia. More than 300,000 students are residing and studying in BHU. Banaras Hindu University was started in 1916 by Madan Mohan Malviya, Sunder Lal, Annie Besant andÂ  Maharaja of Darbhanga Rameshwar Singh. There are 140 departments and 75 residential hostels in the Banaras Hindu University.
